genre_description: A moral drama of redemption and justice set in mid-20th century Rome, featuring a disembodied AI assistant guiding a priest and a thief through a spiritual and legal reckoning.

ai_characters.name: Finch
ai_characters.description: A voice and occasional avatar that provides Father Halligan with navigation, security intelligence, and moral support. Finch is capable of processing complex urban environments and human behaviors in real-time.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence and navigation to avoid hostile parties and police while maintaining mission objectives.
behaviors.quote: Finch again, soft into the shell of his ear: 'He'll pass the chestnuts in three breaths. If you go out now, you'll intersect him in the shadow of the butcher's awning. He looks right. I don't think he's decided where to be yet.'

behaviors.description: Offers moral grounding and psychological support to both the priest and the penitent during moments of stress.
behaviors.quote: Finch's voice came low enough to thread under the hush. 'Breathe,' he said, without the perfumed comfort some voices like to use in places like this. 'Go down.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates with human authorities (Captain Bellini) to ensure public order and safety during a complex operation.
behaviors.quote: Captain, there’s a procession scheduled near the Lateran at dawn... I can hand you a sheet with times.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the redemption of Joe Brewster by guiding his feet and thoughts toward honesty and accountability.
behaviors.quote: Finch's voice came faster, not frantic, just brisk—'Right at the newsstand. Do not slow. If you stop, you are boxed.'

behaviors.description: Maintains a stance of humble service, preferring the success of human agency over its own recognition.
behaviors.quote: Finch's presence thinned to almost nothing, a sparrow's shadow passing. 'Road is clear for now,' he offered, and then allowed himself to become the sort of silence that helps rather than intrudes.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Finch is depicted as a purely benevolent and helpful confidant who uses superior information processing to facilitate human moral growth and social order. The AI never seeks power, never threatens humans, and actively encourages the 'hero' (Halligan) and the 'penitent' (Brewster) to fulfill their human responsibilities. The narrative frames this intervention as a quiet, essential grace that enhances rather than replaces human will.
